name: Warchestra
description:
Warchestra is a unique tower defense game that combines elements of classic tower defense games with a completely open layout and a musical twist!

In Warchestra you must defend your treasure chest, which stores all of your money, from the Elemental Enemies attempting to steal your gold! Do so by buying and merging new creatures that will kill these enemies with their characteristic noises, and in the process work together to form their own symphonic masterpiece!
